attributes.action: STOP Cheap Booze and Food at Westminster
attributes.additional_details: Now that our Prime Minister has decided that the majority should suffer because of the actions of the minority over binge drinking, WHEN WILL HE ANNOUNCE THAT ALL REPEAT ALL SUBSIDIES GIVEN ON ALCOHOL AND FOOD SUPPLIES IN THE PALACE OF WESTMINSTER WILL BE WITHDRAWN.  Entirely in support of US ALL BEING IN THIS TOGETHER?
